description: This service returns a list of hotels with multiple shopping offers around a city center or geolocation for a given date range.
It is also possible to directly ask for a specific list of hotels.
The user can refine the search criteria by asking for specific hotel categories, hotel chains or hotel facilities, such as parking or restaurant.
It is also possible to ask for a specific meal or budget.

By default, only available hotels are returned, with the cheapest available option for each hotel. It is however also possible to retrieve details about the closed properties, and to retrieve all available offers per hotel.
__Warning__: at this step only preliminary prices are returned. Use the next service to ask for a single hotel to retrieve exact prices.
__Minimum mandatory parameters for a hotel search (mutually exclusive):__
Get the cheapest hotel offers in Paris today with a search radius of 5 Km around the city center. Include all available hotel descriptive content.
"text": "NIGHTLY VALUE RATE\nSTANDARD STUDIO 1 QUEEN NONSMKNG ACCESSIBLE\nFREE WIFI"
"text": "The best western au trocadero is located in one of the most elegant district of paris, facing the trocadero, the eiffel tower and champ de mars. You will enjoy the friendly setting."
"text": "FLEXIBLE RATE*BEST LEAST RESTRICTIVE RATE\n2 SINGLE BEDS,CONFORT RM,GRABBR,RAMP ACCESS,\nWHEELCHAIR"

parameters.name: cityCode
description: Destination City Code (or Airport Code). In case of city code, the search will be done around the city center. Available codes can be found in [IATA table codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) (3 chars IATA Code)

parameters.name: latitude
description: search around a geographical point. The latitude is specified in decimal degrees
__Mandatory parameter for a search by geocodes__

parameters.name: longitude
description: search around a geographical point. The longitude is specified in decimal degrees
__Mandatory parameter for a search by geocodes__

parameters.name: hotelIds
description: Amadeus Property Codes (8 chars) (comma separated list)
__Mandatory parameter for a search by predefined list of hotels__

parameters.name: checkInDate
description: check-in date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD
The lowest accepted value is the present date (no dates in the past).
If not present, the default value will be today's date in the GMT timezone.

parameters.name: checkOutDate
description: check-out date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD
The lowest accepted value is checkInDate+1.
If not present, it will default to checkInDate + 1

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: number of adult guests (1-9) per room

parameters.name: childAges
parameters.description: comma separated list of ages of each child at the time of check-out from the hotel. If several children have the same age, their ages should be repeated in the list

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: maximum distance (in `radiusUnit`) from Destination (city center or geocodes)

parameters.name: hotelName
description: Search by Hotel Name. Accepts maximum 4 keywords.

parameters.name: chains
description: Chain (EM...) or Brand (SB...) or Merchant (AD...) (comma separated list of Amadeus 2 chars Codes)

parameters.name: rateCodes
description: Special Rate (comma separated list of Amadeus 3 chars Codes): Public Rate (PRO...), Qualified Rate (GOV...) or Corporate Rate (IBM...).
When a Corporate Rate is entered, Amadeus performs a check to verify which chains have authorized the caller to view the rate, only authorized chains will be queried for availability.
Warning: The availability response can also contain Public rates.

parameters.name: ratings
description: hotel stars. Up to four values can be requested at the same time in a comma separated list

parameters.name: priceRange
description: filter hotel offers by price per night interval (ex: 200-300 or -300 or 100)
It is mandatory to include a currency when this field is set
Note: a margin of +/- 10% is applied on the daily price

parameters.name: currency
description: use this parameter to request a specific currency. ISO currency code (http://www.iso.org/iso/home/standards/currency_codes.htm).
If a hotel does not support the requested currency, the prices for the hotel will be returned in the local currency of the hotel
and instead a currency conversion rate will be added in the dictionary.

parameters.name: paymentPolicy
parameters.description: filter the response based on a specific payment type. NONE means all types (default)

parameters.name: boardType
description: filter response based on available meals
* HALF_BOARD = DBB / Diner & Bed & Breakfast (only for Aggregators)
* FULL_BOARD = FB / Full Board (only for Aggregators)
* ALL_INCLUSIVE = AI / All Inclusive (only for Aggregators)

parameters.name: includeClosed
parameters.description: show All properties (include Sold Out) or Available only. For Sold Out properties, please check availability on other dates. To be used with `sort` DISTANCE or NONE

parameters.name: bestRateOnly
parameters.description: use to return only the cheapest offer per hotel or all available offers

parameters.name: view
description: hotel descriptive content to include in the response
LIGHT: NONE view + city name, phone number, fax, address, postal code, country code, state code, ratings, 1 image
FULL: LIGHT view + hotel description, amenities and facilities

parameters.name: sort
description: * distance from city center (or reference point)
* lowest price first (warning: all hotels may not be returned)

parameters.name: page[limit]
parameters.description: maximum number of hotels to return in each response

parameters.name: page[offset]
parameters.description: used to specify the next scrolling window if all offers could not be returned in the current response. Use the next link in the response to have it automatically added.

parameters.name: lang
description: if a language is not avaiable the text will be returned in english.
This service will return all available offers for a given hotel at a given date range.
The user can filter the offers returned by asking for a specific meal, rateCode, or other parameters as described here.
Note: At this step, exact prices are returned.
Get all offers for Bulgari Hotels Resorts Milano available today.
"text": "Regular Rate\nSuperior Room garden or patio view, large bathr\noom, 1 King, 35sqm/377sqft, Wireless internet,"
"text": "Regular Rate\nDeluxe Room garden or patio view, walk-in close\nt, large bathroom, 1 King or 2 Queen, 40sqm/430"

parameters.name: checkInDate
description: check-in date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD
The lowest accepted value is the present date (no dates in the past).
If not present, the default value will be today's date in the GMT timezone.

parameters.name: checkOutDate
description: check-out date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD
The lowest accepted value is checkInDate+1.
If not present, it will default to checkInDate + 1

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: number of adult guests (1-9) per room

parameters.name: childAges
parameters.description: comma separated list of ages of each child at the time of check-out from the hotel. If several children have the same age, their ages should be repeated in the list

parameters.name: rateCodes
description: Special Rate (comma separated list of Amadeus 3 chars Codes): Public Rate (PRO...), Qualified Rate (GOV...) or Corporate Rate (IBM...).
When a Corporate Rate is entered, Amadeus performs a check to verify which chains have authorized the caller to view the rate, only authorized chains will be queried for availability.
Warning: The availability response can also contain Public rates.

parameters.name: currency
description: use this parameter to request a specific currency. ISO currency code (http://www.iso.org/iso/home/standards/currency_codes.htm).
If a hotel does not support the requested currency, the prices for the hotel will be returned in the local currency of the hotel
and instead a currency conversion rate will be added in the dictionary.

parameters.name: paymentPolicy
parameters.description: filter the response based on a specific payment type. NONE means all types (default)

parameters.name: boardType
description: filter response based on available meals
* HALF_BOARD = DBB / Diner & Bed & Breakfast (only for Aggregators)
* FULL_BOARD = FB / Full Board (only for Aggregators)
* ALL_INCLUSIVE = AI / All Inclusive (only for Aggregators)

parameters.name: view
description: hotel descriptive content to include in the response
LIGHT: NONE view + city name, phone number, fax, address, postal code, country code, state code, ratings, 1 image
FULL: LIGHT view + hotel description, amenities and facilities

parameters.name: lang
description: if a language is not avaiable the text will be returned in english.
Return all available details of a specific hotel offer.
- descriptions about the meal, room, and special rate.

parameters.name: offerId
parameters.description: offer id to request. Please note that an offer id has a limited lifetime and will expire

parameters.name: lang
description: if a language is not avaiable the text will be returned in english.

definitions.name: HotelOffers
definitions.description: details of the requested hotel and the available offers

properties.name: self
properties.description: a self link to the object

definitions.name: Hotel
definitions.description: Hotel Content

properties.name: brandCode
description: Brand (RT...) (Amadeus 2 chars Code). Small Properties distributed by Merchants may not have a Brand.
Example: AD (Value Hotels) is the Provider/Merchant, and RT (Accor) is the Brand of the Property

properties.name: dupeId
description: Unique Property identifier of the physical hotel.
One physical hotel can be represented by different Providers, each one having its own `hotelID`.
This attribute allows a client application to group together hotels that are actually the same.

lang.description: Language code of the text ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)

properties.name: cityCode
properties.description: Warning: The IATA city code associated to the hotel (not necessary the real Hotel City)

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: Hotel Latitude in decimal degrees (5 decimals)

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: Hotel Longitude in decimal degrees (5 decimals)

properties.name: hotelDistance
properties.description: distance from the point of search to the hotel

objectType.description: distance from the point of search to the hotel

lines.description: When the address is unformatted these lines will contain free form address details.

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 defines codes for the names of countries, dependent territories, and special areas of geographical interest

stateCode.description: ISO 3166-2 defines codes for identifying the principal subdivisions (e.g. provinces or states) of all countries coded in ISO 3166-1

definitions.name: File
definitions.description: media

definitions.name: HotelDistance
definitions.description: distance from the point of search to the hotel

definitions.name: AddressHotel
definitions.description: Address Details

properties.name: lines
properties.description: When the address is unformatted these lines will contain free form address details.

properties.name: countryCode
properties.description: ISO 3166-1 defines codes for the names of countries, dependent territories, and special areas of geographical interest

properties.name: stateCode
properties.description: ISO 3166-2 defines codes for identifying the principal subdivisions (e.g. provinces or states) of all countries coded in ISO 3166-1

definitions.name: ContactHotel
definitions.description: Contact Details

definitions.name: HotelOffer
definitions.description: Hotel Offer

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier of this offer. Might be valid for a temporary period only.

properties.name: checkInDate
description: check-in date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD
The lowest accepted value is today date (no dates in the past).

properties.name: checkOutDate
description: check-out date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD

properties.name: rateCode
description: Special Rate - Provider Response Code (3 chars)
* ARP - AARP - American Association of Retired People (50+) (qualified)

properties.name: rateFamilyEstimated
properties.description: The estimated rate code family of the offer. Grouping various rate plan codes that belongs to the same family and indicates the type of the rate

objectType.description: The estimated rate code family of the offer. Grouping various rate plan codes that belongs to the same family and indicates the type of the rate

type.description: The type of the rate (public=P, negotiated=N, conditional=C)

lang.description: Language code of the text ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)

properties.name: self
properties.description: A self link to the object. Use this to refresh the Offer price

definitions.name: RateFamily
definitions.description: The estimated rate code family of the offer. Grouping various rate plan codes that belongs to the same family and indicates the type of the rate

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the rate (public=P, negotiated=N, conditional=C)

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: Percentage of the commission paid to the travel seller. Value is between 0 and 100

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Amount of the commission paid to the travel seller. The amount is always linked to the currency code of the offer

lang.description: Language code of the text ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)

properties.name: type
description: Room type code, 3 character identifier of the room.
The first character identifies the room type category.
The second numeric character identifies the number of beds.
The third character identifies the bed type.
There is a special case where ROH is returned, this value stands for Run Of House.

properties.name: typeEstimated
properties.description: estimated room category, bed type and number of beds in the room. This information has been parsed from the room description, and is thus only provided for informational purposes

lang.description: Language code of the text ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)

properties.name: adults
properties.description: number of adult guests (1-9) per room

properties.name: childAges
properties.description: Comma separated list of ages of each child at the time of check-out from the hotel. If several children have the same age, the ages will be repeated.

definitions.name: HotelPrice
definitions.description: price information

properties.name: variations
properties.description: Daily price variations and the average daily price (when available) is shown here

definitions.name: PolicyDetails
definitions.description: Booking Rules

properties.name: paymentType
properties.description: payment type. Guarantee means Pay at Check Out. Check the `methods` in `guarantee` or `deposit` or `prepay`.

properties.name: guarantee
properties.description: the guarantee policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments

properties.name: deposit
properties.description: the deposit/prepay policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments, deadline and the amount due

properties.name: prepay
properties.description: the deposit/prepay policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments, deadline and the amount due

definitions.name: EstimatedRoomType
definitions.description: estimated room category, bed type and number of beds in the room. This information has been parsed from the room description, and is thus only provided for informational purposes

properties.name: beds
properties.description: Number of beds in the room (1-9)

definitions.name: PriceVariations
definitions.description: Daily price variations and the average daily price (when available) is shown here

properties.name: average
properties.description: estimated nightly average for the stay

properties.name: changes
properties.description: Some prices may vary during a stay, thus here you can see the daily price per period of the stay

definitions.name: GuaranteePolicy
definitions.description: the guarantee policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments

lang.description: Language code of the text ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)

properties.name: acceptedPayments
properties.description: Accepted Payment Methods and Card Types. Several Payment Methods and Card Types may be available

definitions.name: DepositPolicy
definitions.description: the deposit/prepay policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments, deadline and the amount due

properties.name: deadline
description: The date and time of the deadline in ISO 8601[https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime].
Please note that this value is expressed in the hotels local time zone

lang.description: Language code of the text ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)

properties.name: acceptedPayments
properties.description: Accepted Payment Methods and Card Types. Several Payment Methods and Card Types may be available

definitions.name: HoldPolicy
definitions.description: the hold policy

properties.name: deadline
description: The date and time of the deadline in ISO 8601[https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime].
Please note that this value is expressed in the hotels local time zone

properties.name: type
description: Several penalty types can apply for the same product.

properties.name: numberOfNights
properties.description: Number of nights due as fee in case of cancellation.

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: Percentage of the total stay amount to be paid in case of cancellation. Value is between 0 and 100.

properties.name: deadline
description: Represents the deadline's date. Time is in ISO 8601 [https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime].
Please note that this value is expressed in the hotels local time zone

lang.description: Language code of the text ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)

properties.name: checkIn
properties.description: Check-in From time limit in ISO-8601 format [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#time]

lang.description: Language code of the text ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)

properties.name: checkOut
properties.description: Check-out Until time limit in ISO-8601 format [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#time]

lang.description: Language code of the text ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)

properties.name: code
description: The tax code which identifies the tax.

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: percentage of the tax. Use together with pricingFrequency and pricingMode

properties.name: included
properties.description: Is the tax included in the base amount

properties.name: pricingFrequency
description: Specifies if the tax applies per stay or per night

properties.name: pricingMode
description: Specifies if the tax applies per occupant or per room

definitions.name: BaseTotalAmount
definitions.description: estimated nightly average for the stay

definitions.name: PriceVariation
definitions.description: Some prices may vary during a stay, thus here you can see the daily price per period of the stay

definitions.name: PaymentPolicy
definitions.description: Accepted Payment Methods and Card Types. Several Payment Methods and Card Types may be available

properties.name: creditCards
properties.description: Accepted Payment Card Types for the `method` CREDIT_CARD

definitions.name: TextWithLanguageType
definitions.description: text and language

properties.name: lang
properties.description: Language code of the text ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)

definitions.name: Meta
definitions.description: meta information

properties.name: links
properties.description: links to continue in the shopping process

properties.name: lang
properties.description: the default language of all texts returned

definitions.name: Links
definitions.description: links to continue in the shopping process

properties.name: next
properties.description: Use this link to get the next hotels in the search result

properties.name: currencyConversionLookupRates
description: - Used to convey rate conversions the requested currency differs from the currency returned by a hotel

definitions.name: CurrencyConversionRate
definitions.description: conversion from provider's currency to requested currency

properties.name: rate
properties.description: The conversion factor to apply against the source currency to obtain the requested currency

properties.name: targetDecimalPlaces
properties.description: Indicates the number of decimal places for the target currency

definitions.name: Error
definitions.description: Error

properties.name: code
properties.description: [Integer] A machine-readable error code from the Amadeus Canned Messages table, that will enable the API Consumers code to handle this type of error

properties.name: title
properties.description: [String] An error title from the Canned Messages table with a 1:1 correspondence to the error code. This may be localized

properties.name: detail
properties.description: [String] An easy-to-read explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. It should give the API consumer an idea of what went wrong and how to recover from it. Like the title, this fields value can be localized.

properties.name: status
properties.description: [Integer] The [HTTP status code](https://www.iana.org/assignments/http-status-codes/http-status-codes.xhtml) of this response. This is present only in terminal errors which cause an unsuccessful response. In the case of multiple errors, they must all have the same status.

name: Amadeus_HotelSearch
about: The Hotel Search REST/JSON API is a hotel search API that enables you to find the best hotel offers that match your search from a wide choice of providers. The results contain the hotel details and will allow the user to select their preferred option based on price, location and amenities among other factors. A wide range of search criteria can be applied to narrow the search results.

Before using the API you will need to get an access token. Please read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization)** for more information on how to get your token.
